      • Rule

        public Rule(myDataset train,
            java.lang.String linea)
        Constructor with parameters. It initializes a rule from a C4.5 file of rules (just a single line)
        Parameters:
        train - training set
        linea - Line of the file which stores the C4.5 rule set
